withdraw.caption: Welsh Translation required
withdraw.label: Rhoi gwybod fy mod eisiau tynnu’r cyfan neu ran o’m hawliad yn ôl

change-details.caption: Welsh Translation required
change-details.label: Rwyf eisiau newid fy manylion personol

postpone.caption: Welsh Translation required
postpone.label: Gwneud cais i ohirio fy ngwrandawiad

vary.caption: Welsh Translation required
vary.label: Gwneud cais i amrywio neu ddirymu gorchymyn

reconsider-decision.caption: Welsh Translation required
reconsider-decision.label: Gwneud cais i benderfyniad gael ei ystyried o’r newydd

amend.caption: Welsh Translation required
amend.label: Gwneud cais i ddiwygio fy hawliad

respondent.caption: Welsh Translation required
respondent.label: Gorchymyn bod yr atebydd yn gwneud rhywbeth

witness.caption: Welsh Translation required
witness.label: Gorchymyn bod tyst yn bresennol i roi tystiolaeth

non-compliance.caption: Welsh Translation required
non-compliance.label: Dweud wrth y tribiwnlys nad yw’r atebydd wedi cydymffurfio â gorchymyn

publicity.caption: Welsh Translation required
publicity.label: Gwneud cais i gyfyngu ar gyhoeddusrwydd

strike.caption: Welsh Translation required
strike.label: Dileu’r cyfan neu ran o’r ymateb

reconsider-judgement.caption: Welsh Translation required
reconsider-judgement.label: Gwneud cais i ddyfarniad gael ei ailystyried

other.caption: Welsh Translation required
other.label: Cysylltu â’r tribiwnlys am rywbeth arall
